channel.title: design on LcodeJ
channel.description: Recent content in design on LcodeJ

item.title: Key Value Store
item.description: Hash table is easy to understand in concept. But the key value store, a distributed hash table with high availability requires sophisticated design.

item.title: Dependency Injection
item.description: Dependency injection is one of my favorite design pattern. The application is kind of transparent, which is one-off configuration in the app startup, and then use it naturally like it doesn’t exist.

item.title: Azure SQL Data Warehouse Performance
item.description: My recent project uses Azure SQL Data Warehouse. The performance surprised me. I have the question is SQL Data Warehouse based on the technology of traditional SQL Server, and scale up?
